item.title: Mystery Castle Coming Soon to Xbox One
item.description:
Mystery Castle Coming Soon to Xbox One

A retro-inspired masterpiece, Mystery Castle is the one puzzle game that will rule them all! This game is for everyone who loves adventure, treasure hunting, laughing out loud, transforming into creatures, drinking potions, possessing monsters, explosions, inept wizards, witless golems, huge floating eyeballs, magic portals, magic lanterns, grumpy dwarfs, cheerful eskimos, irate hotel owners, giant monsters, throwing bombs at giant monsters...

item.title: Battleborn Launch Trailer
item.description:
Battleborn Launch Trailer

As the universe is about to blink out of existence, it's up to you and this motley crew of Battleborn to save it. Some interdimensional jerks and a traitorous scumbag have been taking stars. WHOLE STARS. And have left us to fend for the scraps.

item.title: Official Launch Trailer - DC Universe Online - NOW on Xbox One!
item.description:
Official Launch Trailer - DC Universe Online - NOW on Xbox One!

DC Universe Online is NOW AVAILABLE on Xbox One. Experience the only MMO set in the DC Universe. Create your own hero or villain today and fight alongside and against legendary characters in the DC Universe. Experience visceral combat where you control every blow. DOWNLOAD NOW: http://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/dc-universe-online

item.title: Be the Playmaker and Play Madden NFL 16 Free This Weekend only on Xbox One
item.description:
Be the Playmaker and Play Madden NFL 16 Free This Weekend only on Xbox One

Now that NFL Draft Season is well underway, it's the perfect time to play some pigskin! We are excited to announce that all Xbox Live Gold members can enjoy the critically acclaimed Madden NFL 16 for free this entire upcoming weekend with Xbox Live Gold's Free Play Days.

item.title: King's Quest - Chapter 3: Once Upon a Climb
item.description:
King's Quest - Chapter 3: Once Upon a Climb

King's Quest - Once Upon a Climb is the third chapter in the new, critically-acclaimed reimagining of the classic King's Quest game series. In his latest adventure, King Graham recounts his most personal tale yet. When the magic mirror reveals the location of his one-true love, Graham must climb to daring new heights to save his future Queen.

item.title: Forza Motorsport 6: Apex Open Beta on Windows 10 Arrives May 5
item.description:
Forza Motorsport 6: Apex Open Beta on Windows 10 Arrives May 5

A new era for the Forza Motorsport series begins on May 5 with the release of the open beta for Forza Motorsport 6: Apex. Crafted specifically for Windows 10, Apex represents the critical first step in the future of the Forza franchise as it expands onto Windows 10 PCs.

item.title: The Long Dark "Tireless Menance" Update Available Now
item.description:
The Long Dark "Tireless Menance" Update Available Now

The Long Dark's recent update, ""Tireless Menace"", includes new Challenge Modes, an improved Radial Menu, Rest System overhaul and more! Footage captured on a PC.

item.title: Homefront: The Revolution 'America Has Fallen' Trailer (Official)
item.description:
Homefront: The Revolution 'America Has Fallen' Trailer (Official)

Discover the terrifying near-future world of Homefront with this cinematic intro to the game. It tells the story of how North Korea rose from the ashes of the Korean War to become a dominant world power, and ultimately occupy a fallen America.

item.title: This Week's Deals With Gold And Spotlight Sale
item.description:
This Week's Deals With Gold And Spotlight Sale

Here are this week's games and add-on deals on the Xbox Games Store. Discounts are valid now through 02 May 2016.

item.title: Xbox - May Games with Gold
item.description:
Xbox - May Games with Gold

Play together with Xbox Live Gold. May's Games with Gold lineup for Xbox One includes Defense Grid 2 and Costume Quest 2. For Xbox 360 owners, (and through Xbox One backwards compatibility) May kicks off with Grid 2, followed by Peggle.
